mapper.sql: a.ID AS id, a.job_name as jobName, a.job_desc as jobDesc, a.src_hdfs_address as srcHdfsAddress, a.src_hdfs_dir as srcHdfsDir, a.src_hdfs_version as srcHdfsVersion, a.output_dir as outPutDir, a.log_dir as logDir, a.copy_num as copyNum, a.is_override as isOverride, a.STATUS as status, a.REMARKS AS "remarks", a.SORT_NUM as sortNum, a.CREATE_BY AS "createBy.id", a.CREATE_DATE as "createDate", a.UPDATE_BY AS "updateBy", a.UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate", a.sqr AS"sqr"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dc_job_transHdfs a
WHERE a.job_name = #{jobName} AND a.DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dc_job_transHdfs( id, job_name, job_desc, src_hdfs_address, src_hdfs_dir, src_hdfs_version, output_dir, log_dir, copy_num, is_override, remarks, status, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, sqr, SORT_NUM, DEL_FLAG ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{jobName}, #{jobDesc}, #{srcHdfsAddress}, #{srcHdfsDir}, #{srcHdfsVersion}, #{outPutDir}, #{logDir}, #{copyNum}, #{isOverride}, #{remarks}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{sqr}, #{sortNum}, #{delFlag} )
